name: Peacekeeper (JC)
description:
PeaceKeeper is a stealth, first person, time based thriller game where you illegally break into and extensively search a house for guns in order to save the neighbourhood from a mad man.

PeaceKeeper is a indie game developed by a two-men team as an experimental project in Unreal Engine 5 within a 3 months period for a school assignment. This is our first ever game built in Unreal engine.

Developers: Ng Jia Ching & Ryan Misson

Recommended PC System Requirement:
  • Game is not available for MAC OS.
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, Windows 11
  • CPU: Any Intel Gen 6 and above should work
  • Memory: 16GB RAM
  • GPU: Any RTX cards should work fine.
Unable to play? Here's a full walkthrough of the game! THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT! WE HOPE YOU ENJOY PLAYING!
